paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a BRCA2 variant identified in a patient with early-onset paraganglioma.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A BRCA2 splice-site variant, c.8488-1G>A, was detected in a 25-year-old male patient with early-onset paraganglioma.

variants.segregation_data: No personal or family history of cancer related to BRCA2.
variants.evidence_level: limited evidence due to lack of family history and personal cancer history.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had no personal history or family history of BRCA2 related cancer.
key_quotes: A BRCA2 splice-site variant, c.8488-1G>A, was detected in a 25-year-old male patient with early-onset paraganglioma.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
